scripts.dev:example: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently --raw -k "cd examples/website1 && npm start" "cd examples/website2 && npm start"
scripts.serve:example: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently --raw -k "cd examples/website1 && npm serve" "cd examples/website2 && npm serve"
scripts.install:example: concurrently --raw -k "cd examples/website1 && yarn install" "cd examples/website2 && yarn install"
